metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1386 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in unshield 1.0-1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunshield0 - 1.4.2-1
unshield - 1.4.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: unshield package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-1').
